comment: A necessary and sufficient condition (that holds when ` T ` is a Hermitian operator) for two eigenvectors ` A ` and ` B ` to be orthogonal. Generalization of Equation 1.31 of [Hughes] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
